item.title: Wellness Center Exercise Classes
item.description: Wellness Center exercise classes for members only: Chair Exercises M, W, F, 9-10am | Water Aerobics T, TH, 11:30am-12:30pm | Yoga M, 5:15-6:15pm & TH 12:10pm-12:50pm | Functional Fitness Class, ages 55+, T, TH, 2:30-3pm in Gymnasium. For more information, call 918-332-4327.

item.title: Wellness Center Gymnasium
item.description: Pick Up Basketball for members age 16 and older. Located in the Wellness Center Gymnasium, every Monday evening from 5:30-7:30pm. For more information, call 918-332-4327.

item.title: Quit Smoking
item.description: Cigarette smoking is more common among American Indian and Alaska Native (AI/AN) people than almost any other racial or ethnic group in the United States. Itâ€™s never too late to quit smoking. Quitting smoking now improves your health and reduces your risk of heart disease, cancer, lung disease, and other smoking-related illnesses. For help with quitting, talk to your provider or contact a Public Health Nurse at (918) 332-4343 or (918) 332-4306.

item.title: Clinic Closed
item.description: NTHS Clinic and Wellness Center will be closed Monday, February 16, 2026 in observance of Presidents Day.
